zh_CN.DialogText: 但是你要知道，给这里的人带来辐射和疾病的，是你那边的人。

en_US.DialogText: But you should know that it is the people on your side who bring radiation and disease to the people here.

zh_CN.DialogText: 你听我说啊，他们发射核弹，和我一个普通人又有什么关系呢？

en_US.DialogText: Listen to me. What does it have to do with me, an ordinary person, when they launch a nuclear bomb?

zh_CN.DialogText: 这我当然知道，但是你也要知道，我因为这个并不想帮助你

en_US.DialogText: Of course I know that, but you should also know that I don't want to help you because of this

zh_CN.DialogText: 我见过这里的大部分人都很友善的，他们建议我来找你.....

en_US.DialogText: Most of the people I've met here are very friendly. They suggested that I come to you

zh_CN.DialogText: 别扯其他的，你是死是活，与我没有任何关系！

en_US.DialogText: Don't talk about anything else. Whether you live or die has nothing to do with me!

zh_CN.DialogText: 有着外国面孔的人快速地离开了

en_US.DialogText: The man with a foreign face left quickly

zh_CN.DialogText: 什么也没有得到，什么也没有失去。
是的，他只是一个无法干预结局的普通人，这是很清楚的。

en_US.DialogText: Yes, he is just an ordinary person who can't interfere with the outcome, which is very clear.

zh_CN.DialogText: 或许只是想找一个借口来拒绝他和安慰自己罢了。

en_US.DialogText: Maybe I just want to find an excuse to refuse him and comfort myself.

zh_CN.DialogText: 当然，末日生活还要继续...
